segments.text: I observe this domestic moment in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's intent on her task, drying dishes methodically.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink behind her is overflowing uncontrollably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheets down the front, pooling on the tile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a shame; the floor will be ruined if it keeps up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in the puddle, yet she remains unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, the children are on an adventure of their own.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy balances precariously on the stool, grabbing cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he'll tumble right into the wet spot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl watches eagerly, arm extended for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar's full, but this sneaky theft feels a bit heartbreaking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden blooms innocently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, it's all potential sorrow from these oversights.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone notices before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
